subject: Re: [patchmanagement] KB5020276—Netjoin: Domain join hardening changes
email_text_original:
Here, we created an exception group, added trusted users to that group (ones who
manage workstations and really do need to (re)join computers to AD). That group
is referenced in this DC GPO setting. We've been in enforcement mode for a
couple of years and it has worked out well. Of course, your situation may be
much different. 
Domain controller: Allow computer account re-use during domain join 
On Wed, Feb 14, 2024 at 5:18 PM Kurt Buff <kurt.buff@gmail.com
Link: https://groups.google.com/d/msgid/patchmanagement/CAEuHzzn1DJYCkr4B3mggy3Y3C4bAWhLw_ET1orgzm%3DsW1-i3dA%40mail.gmail.com
